text: Maxine Brown (April 27, 1931 â€“ January 21, 2019) was an American country music singer. She was born in Campti, Louisiana. Brown was originally a member of the successful 1950s trio the Browns, before a brief solo career. She retired in 1968. Brown died on January 21, 2019 in Little Rock, Arkansas from complications of heart and kidney disease, aged 87. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Arkansas Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:American country singers Category:Singers from Louisiana
title: Maxine Brown (country singer)
